status: Exploring Machine Learning with Hands-on Projects
description: Began developing foundational Machine Learning projects using linear and logistic regression on sample datasets. Built an interactive 'playground' for visualization, with ongoing updates planned for real-world data integration.
Built a Python-based system to replay historical market data, simulate trading scenarios, and visualize the impact of major macro events.
My third time running the Tokyo Marathon. The atmosphere was full of energy and excitement, with plenty of food along the course and cheerful supporters all the way, making the run truly enjoyable.

status: Chrome Extension for Integrated Market Analysis
description: Developed a Chrome extension designed to simplify stock market analysis by aggregating key data from multiple sources onto a single trading chart. The tool gathers crucial information such as important news, SET reports, shareholder activity, and insider transactions, and plots it directly onto the stock graph for comprehensive historical and real-time analysis.

description: The sunrise was a no-show, thanks to a surprise storm. But, at least we got some great photos on the way down!

Developed an automated system for real-time market analysis, delivered via a LINE chatbot. The system was built with Python, FastAPI, and Firebase, leveraging Google Cloud Functions for a serverless backend. It integrated with the SET and TwelveData APIs to provide users with instant, chart-based insights and analysis.

description: Began developing an interest in financial markets and building custom tools for personal investment. Designed advanced TradingView Pine Script indicators and alert systems, integrated with Discord bots to deliver real-time trading signals. This project serves as a foundation for further development in the financial technology (FinTech) space.

status: Chrome Extension & Web App for E-commerce
description: Developed a full-stack solution with a Chrome extension and a web app to provide essential tools for online sellers and buyers. The platform featured a real-time price comparison panel on any website and an image-based search function to find similar products on eBay and AliExpress. While initially a personal project to support my own affiliate marketing efforts, the tools were also designed to serve the broader e-commerce community.

status: Chrome Extension & Web App for Online Sellers
description: Developed a comprehensive set of internal tools, including a Chrome extension and a web app, to streamline my own Amazon business operations. Some functions were later shared with Thai Amazon sellers, providing solutions for tasks like keyword analysis and trademark checks.

description: Established and managed a private export and e-commerce business on Amazon USA with a team based in Thailand. I have been working remotely from Japan since 2017. Applied data-driven product research, keyword analytics, and branding to drive sales growth. Built Python automation scripts to streamline operations and gained expertise in marketplace analytics, customer behavior, and performance optimization.
Successfully completed my role at Schlumberger, having contributed to key projects and developed advanced skills in directional drilling.
Completed specialized training to become a certified Directional Driller, a key role in complex drilling operations.

Successfully completed intensive job training to become a certified field engineer.

description: Joined a new team as a field engineer.
